title: nallani mEni
sahitya:
nallani mEni nagavu chUpula vADu

tellani kannula dEvuDu





caraNam 1



birusaina danujula pinchhamaNachinaTTi 

tirupu kaiduva tODi dEvuDu 

saripaDDa jagamella chakka chhAyaku dechchi 

teravu chUpinaTTi dEvuDu 



caraNam 2



nITagalasinaTTi ninDina chaduvulu 

tETa parachinaTTi dEvuDu 

pATimAlinaTTi prANula duritapu 

tITa rAsinaTTi dEvuDu  



caraNam 3



gurutuveTTagarAni guNamula nelakonna 

tiruvEnkaTAdripai dEvuDu

tiramuga dhruvuniki divyapadambichchi 

terachi rAjannaTTi dEvuDu
